summary: This document is an invoice from J Epstein & Co Inc detailing transportation charges for FedEx services. It includes multiple entries for packages sent, with dates of pickup and delivery, as well as charges associated with each shipment. The invoice highlights the operational aspects of the business, including sender and recipient details.

keyFacts: The invoice is dated September 12, 1999, and details transportation charges for FedEx services.
Multiple employees of J Epstein & Co Inc are mentioned as senders of packages.
The total charges for the services rendered amount to USD 121.74.
Packages were picked up on various dates, including August 30, September 1, September 2, and September 3, 1999.
Several recipients are listed, indicating the operational nature of the business.
